title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken thighs or breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 cup heavy cream or coconut cream
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, 1 tsp salt, cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, and half the garam masala.
Add chicken pieces to the marinade, coat well, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour (or overnight for best flavor).
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the remaining garam masala and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes until the sauce thickens and oil separates slightly.
Add marinated chicken pieces to the sauce. Cover and cook 15-20 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Stir in the cream and simmer 5 minutes more. Adjust salt to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan.
